title: Designing a Mobile Project-Based Learning Platform for Business Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Understanding of Business Processes and Scientific Methodologies
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen science-based business decision-making competencies, providing a project environment combining mobile devices and VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world business problems using VR simulations and propose solutions applying scientific methodologies.
Learners can use collaboration tools on mobile platforms to develop and refine project deliverables in real-time with team members.

Learners extract three or more key metrics from provided business datasets (sales, customer behavior) using Python (Pandas, NumPy) and Excel, write analytical reports quantifying strategy effectiveness at over 80% accuracy, and present data-driven proposals at least twice in team decision-making meetings.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
